description: This file defines a mock class `Store2NotificationMock` for testing purposes, which implements the interface `WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::INotification`. It includes a mocked method `ValueChanged` to simulate notifications when a stored value changes.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the `WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::INotification` interface, used for testing components that rely on store notifications.

methods.name: ~Store2NotificationMock
methods.description: Destructor for the mock class, defaulted.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mocked method to simulate notification of a value change in the store.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
